sentences.en: He stifled his temptation to take hold of Ivy and shake her.
sentences.cn: 他压抑住想要抓住艾薇摇晃她的冲动。

sentences.en: Her wedding bouquet consisted of roses and ivy.
sentences.cn: 她的婚礼花篮包括玫瑰和长春藤.

sentences.en: Holly, like ivy and mistletoe, is an evergreen.
sentences.cn: 冬青和常春藤、槲寄生一样，都是常绿植物。
常春藤爬满了这些断墙.

sentences.en: Ivy leaves embellish the front of the dresser.
sentences.cn: 梳妆台正面饰有常春藤叶子。

sentences.en: Ivy must be a glutton for punishment.
sentences.cn: 艾维一定是个不怕吃苦的家伙。

sentences.en: ivy twining around a tree trunk
The club was run by Miss Ivy Streeter.
sentences.cn: 这家俱乐部是由艾薇·斯特里特小姐经营的

sentences.en: The front of the building was covered with ivy.
sentences.cn: 大楼的正面爬满了常春藤。

sentences.en: The ivy clings to the wall.
The ivy has climbed up the wall.
The wall is covered all over with ivy.
They went out a lot, to the Cafe Royal or the The Ivy.
sentences.cn: 他们常常出去玩，一般是到皇家咖啡馆或者常春藤那里。

sentences.en: This ivy was green at a time when other ivies had pooped out.
sentences.cn: 这棵常春藤在其他常春藤都已凋谢时却仍然是绿的。

sentences.en: We're going to grow a variegated ivy up the back of the house.
sentences.cn: 我们打算在房子后面种一棵杂色常春藤.

words.tran_cn: 常春藤遮盖着的；长满常春藤的

phrases.tran_cn: 长春藤联盟；长春藤名牌大学
毒葛；接触毒漆引起的皮疹

trans.tran_en: a climbing plant with dark green shiny leaves
